channel.title: For anyone who cares... The Season Two sannin exam:
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "For anyone who cares... The Season Two sannin exam:" - Copypasted data. I'm not going to bother raking screenshots.

item.title: Re: For anyone who cares... The Season Two sannin exam:
item.content:encoded: Please add it to the wiki. I'm too lazy to do it myself. (As usual. >.>)

item.title: For anyone who cares... The Season Two sannin exam:
item.content:encoded:
The Big Three
Do you have what it takes to become Legendary?
Attempt to become Sannin >

The Best

Simply, to be the best, you must be The Best.

I am today's Number 1 Player
(If the mission has a requirement, be sure to have completed it before you click above, or you'll fail the mission!)

The Best

SUCCESS!
You show the fundamental basics. Let us proceed.
Continue Mission >

The Three Original Legends

By hook or by crook, you must be recognized by the original three Sannin. Get them on your team!

I have The Rack, J-Diddy, and SNAKEMAN in my Team
(If the mission has a requirement, be sure to have completed it before you click above, or you'll fail the mission!)

*(Didn't copy the success message for that part at the time, and using the Back button to look for it gives me some message about postdata. >.>)

A Great Village

You must be from a great Village - one recognized not for a single action, but for withstanding the test of time.

My Village has the Epic Monument
(If the mission has a requirement, be sure to have completed it before you click above, or you'll fail the mission!)

A Great Village

SUCCESS!
Your village's monument only awaits your visage.
Continue Mission >

Taijutsu

Epic Battle

There was an epic battle, long long ago, that you won. How do people remember it?

Difficulty: 12 Successes: 12

Succeed! That's right - with you kicking legendary butt.

Ninjutsu

Epic Knowledge

You must have a deep understanding of all things Ninja - deep enough that you carry it in hte very way you exist..

Difficulty: 12 Successes: 12

Succeed! ..which is something you are well known for.

Genjutsu

Epic Wisdom

Finally, are you the type of person to have the answers to everything

Difficulty: 12 Successes: 12

Succeed! Your words echo across nations.

You are known far and wide as Sannin!
You are Sannin!

You now get 250 Stamina per day, get 15% extra Ryo on missions, and can partake in the Sealing of Demons!
